title: Compensate Players for Server Outage
description: After a prolonged server outage, the company decides to give all affected players a small gift of in-game currency as an apology.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all players who attempted to log in during the outage period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all affected player accounts.

tasks.description: Run a script to grant a specified amount of in-game currency to all players on the list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully executes the script to distribute the compensation.

tasks.description: Post a message in the game and on social media apologizing for the outage and announcing the gift.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the apology and compensation to the player base.
